languages.text: "В прошлом ты не раз говорил{mf||а} мне больше обращать внимания на мои проступки", {n}— горько замечает Арджента.{/n} "Но сейчас не время для этого разговора. Надо остановить это чудовище и защитить святыню. Идем же!"

traits.locale_text: "В прошлом ты не раз говорил{mf||а} мне больше обращать внимания на мои проступки", {n}— горько замечает Арджента.{/n} "Но сейчас не время для этого разговора. Надо остановить это чудовище и защитить святыню. Идем же!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "You have told me more than once to pay more attention to the errors I make," {n}Argenta says with bitterness.{/n} "But now is not the time for this conversation. We must stop that monster and protect the relic. Come!"
languages.original_text: "В прошлом ты не раз говорил{mf||а} мне больше обращать внимания на мои проступки", {n}— горько замечает Арджента.{/n} "Но сейчас не время для этого разговора. Надо остановить это чудовище и защитить святыню. Идем же!"

traits.locale_text: "You have told me more than once to pay more attention to the errors I make," {n}Argenta says with bitterness.{/n} "But now is not the time for this conversation. We must stop that monster and protect the relic. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have told me more than once to pay more attention to the errors I make," {n}Argenta says with bitterness.{/n} "But now is not the time for this conversation. We must stop that monster and protect the relic. Come!"

traits.locale_text: "You have told me more than once to pay more attention to the errors I make," {n}Argenta says with bitterness.{/n} "But now is not the time for this conversation. We must stop that monster and protect the relic. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have told me more than once to pay more attention to the errors I make," {n}Argenta says with bitterness.{/n} "But now is not the time for this conversation. We must stop that monster and protect the relic. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have told me more than once to pay more attention to the errors I make," {n}Argenta says with bitterness.{/n} "But now is not the time for this conversation. We must stop that monster and protect the relic. Come!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「陛下は我の過ちに注意を払えと何度も言われた」{n}アルジェンタが苦々しく言った。{/n}「しかし今はこんな話をしている場合ではありません。あの怪物を止めて聖遺物を守らなくては。行こう！」
languages.original_text: "You have told me more than once to pay more attention to the errors I make," {n}Argenta says with bitterness.{/n} "But now is not the time for this conversation. We must stop that monster and protect the relic. Come!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下は我の過ちに注意を払えと何度も言われた」{n}アルジェンタが苦々しく言った。{/n}「しかし今はこんな話をしている場合ではありません。あの怪物を止めて聖遺物を守らなくては。行こう！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “是你多次语重心长地教导我，说要多留意自己犯下的错误。”{n}阿洁塔的声音中充满了苦涩。{/n}“不过，现在不是谈这种事情的时候。我们必须消灭那些敌人，保护圣物！快来吧！”
languages.original_text: "You have told me more than once to pay more attention to the errors I make," {n}Argenta says with bitterness.{/n} "But now is not the time for this conversation. We must stop that monster and protect the relic. Come!"

traits.locale_text: “是你多次语重心长地教导我，说要多留意自己犯下的错误。”{n}阿洁塔的声音中充满了苦涩。{/n}“不过，现在不是谈这种事情的时候。我们必须消灭那些敌人，保护圣物！快来吧！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous n'avez cessé de me répéter de réfléchir à mes erreurs, {n}rétorque Argenta avec amertume.{/n} Mais le moment est mal choisi pour revenir là-dessus. Pour l'heure, nous devons arrêter ce monstre et protéger la relique. Venez ! »
languages.original_text: "You have told me more than once to pay more attention to the errors I make," {n}Argenta says with bitterness.{/n} "But now is not the time for this conversation. We must stop that monster and protect the relic. Come!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez cessé de me répéter de réfléchir à mes erreurs, {n}rétorque Argenta avec amertume.{/n} Mais le moment est mal choisi pour revenir là-dessus. Pour l'heure, nous devons arrêter ce monstre et protéger la relique. Venez ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «En varias ocasiones me ha dicho que preste atención a mis errores», {n}responde Argenta con amargura.{/n} «Pero ya hemos hablado bastante. Debemos detener a ese monstruo y proteger la reliquia. ¡Vamos!».
languages.original_text: "You have told me more than once to pay more attention to the errors I make," {n}Argenta says with bitterness.{/n} "But now is not the time for this conversation. We must stop that monster and protect the relic. Come!"

traits.locale_text: «En varias ocasiones me ha dicho que preste atención a mis errores», {n}responde Argenta con amargura.{/n} «Pero ya hemos hablado bastante. Debemos detener a ese monstruo y proteger la reliquia. ¡Vamos!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt mir mehrfach gesagt, ich solle meinen Fehlern mehr Aufmerksamkeit widmen", {n}sagt Argenta verbittert.{/n} "Aber jetzt ist nicht der richtige Zeitpunkt für dieses Gespräch. Wir müssen dieses Monster aufhalten und das Relikt beschützen. Kommt!"
languages.original_text: "You have told me more than once to pay more attention to the errors I make," {n}Argenta says with bitterness.{/n} "But now is not the time for this conversation. We must stop that monster and protect the relic. Come!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mir mehrfach gesagt, ich solle meinen Fehlern mehr Aufmerksamkeit widmen", {n}sagt Argenta verbittert.{/n} "Aber jetzt ist nicht der richtige Zeitpunkt für dieses Gespräch. Wir müssen dieses Monster aufhalten und das Relikt beschützen. Kommt!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Yaptığım hatalara dikkat etme konusunda beni birçok kez uyarmıştın." {n}Argenta'nın sesinde bir hoşnutsuzluk seziliyor.{/n} "Şimdi bunu konuşmanın sırası değil. O canavarı durdurup yadigâra sahip çıkmalıyız. Hadi!"
languages.original_text: "You have told me more than once to pay more attention to the errors I make," {n}Argenta says with bitterness.{/n} "But now is not the time for this conversation. We must stop that monster and protect the relic. Come!"

traits.locale_text: "Yaptığım hatalara dikkat etme konusunda beni birçok kez uyardın." {n}Argenta'nın sesinde bir hoşnutsuzluk seziliyor.{/n} "Ancak bu konuşmanın sırası değil. O canavarı durdurup yadigâra sahip çıkmalıyız. Gel hadi!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
